alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:18PM EST until January 19 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Isolated pockets of freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New York, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Tompkins, Madison, Cortland, Chenango and Broome counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne county. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few pockets of freezing temperatures and freezing rain still remain. These remaining areas are expected to warm up this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found at 511ny.org or 511pa.com, or dial 5-1-1.
